Many restaurants in the Normandy Park and Tukwila areas have older plumbing systems, which are more susceptible to grease buildup. The heavy rainfall in the area can cause sewer infiltration and foundation drainage issues, making regular grease trap cleaning essential for maintaining your restaurant's plumbing. Our experts will ensure that the grease trap is properly maintained to prevent costly repairs and potential health hazards.
